message: I propose a fair split, 90 for me, 10 for you.  It's a good start!
Let's be reasonable, Alice.  I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.  This is your last chance for a decent share before inflation eats away at your potential gains.
Okay, Bob.  I'm willing to compromise a bit further, but I need at least 40% of the money.  I'm not letting you take everything!
